skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: A React front-end developer specializes in creating interactive and user-friendly web applications using the React JavaScript library. Proficient in building responsive and dynamic user interfaces, they leverage their expertise in state management, component-based architecture, and modern web development practices to deliver seamless and visually appealing digital experiences. Strong problem-solving skills and a keen understanding of UI/UX principles are essential for success in this role.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: A Node.js back-end developer is skilled in building robust server-side applications using the Node.js runtime. Proficient in JavaScript, they create scalable and efficient back-end systems, handle data storage, and implement APIs to facilitate seamless communication between the front end and server. Their expertise extends to leveraging Node.js's event-driven, non-blocking architecture for high-performance and real-time applications.
